General.Name: Aloys Inc.
General.Description: Aloys Inc. develops and supplies smart STB products. The company offers digital STB products for digital broadcasting; and multi-functional STB products, which allows various IP/NW features by Ethernet connection. Its products include IPTV, satellite, cable, and terrestrial equipment. The company is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: Hanwha Techwin R&D Building, Seongnam, South Korea, 13438
